titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to remove military department ceilings on the number of Reserve Officers' Training Corps scholarships.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

bill.summary: 3/26/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal armed forces provisions to remove the individual military department ceilings on the number of Reserve Officers' Training Corps (ROTC) scholarships to be awarded at any one time, imposing instead a maximum number of scholarships for cadets and midshipmen in all military departments.
